name: Citérama
summary: In this experimental animated short, Ryan Larkin creates a series of figures who move across the screen and disappear into a hole. Eventually, the hole metamorphoses into a bridge, on top of which stands the young man from whom the other figures originated.
info:
• 导演: Ryan Larkin
  • 别名: Cityscape
  • 上映年度: 1966
  • 片长: 1分26秒
  • 官方网站: http://www.nfb.ca/film/cityscape/
  • 国家: 加拿大
